title: Am I able to switch the orientation of the screen when rotating the phone？
answer:
Yes.  
1、Touch > Settings > Display > Auto-rotate screen (or slide down the state bar)and mark it .  
2、You are able to switch the orientation when you rotate your phone 90 degrees counterclockwise.  
3、If you do not want to switch the orientation of the screen, please unmark Auto-rotate screen in step 1.
